com.surodev.fms.controller

Class ShipController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.surodev.fms.controller.ShipController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="api")
public class ShipController
extends java.lang.Object
    Ships REST controller Handles operations like add ship, get all ships, delete ship, set ship category, set ship owner
